snippet: Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan declined an opportunity to counter hundreds of witnesses and pieces of evidence prosecutors have used.
abstract: Maj Nidal Malik Hassan declines to present a defense in his military trial, passing up an opportunity to counter hundreds of witnesses and pieces of evidence prosecutors have used to persuade a jury to find him guilty of murdering and wounding dozens of soldiers at Fort Hood, Tex, in 2009.
lead_paragraph: Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan declined an opportunity to counter hundreds of witnesses and pieces of evidence prosecutors have used.

headline.main: Calling No Witnesses, Defendant in Fort Hood Shooting Rests His Case
headline.print_headline: Calling No Witnesses, Defendant in Fort Hood Shooting Rests His Case

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
